prompts: Create a giant humanoid Pokemon with a mix of mechanical and organic elements.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of ancient legends and has powerful arms.
Generate a unique Pokemon with a strong presence, featuring a combination of colors and technological aspects.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a guardian of nature, integrating both earthy and metallic features.
Show me a colossal Pokemon that stands in forests, blending technology with natural elements.
Design a Pokemon that represents strength and wisdom, showcasing a vibrant color palette.
Give me a Pokemon with a distinctive humanoid shape, adorned with intricate patterns and colors.

distinctive_features: Large yellow arms with green accents
Absence of a head, with a broad torso
